job.remarks: Taak wordt getriggerd door de inleenuren Excel import

step.datasource: SELECT TOP (1) 0 as doQuit FROM dbo._AB_tb_Fin_Data f WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND f.rowstatus = 0

SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN r.id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) as doQuit FROM (VALUES (0)) l(v) LEFT JOIN [%abeidb%].dbo._AB_Entity_log r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.jobid = '%jobid%' AND r.runid <> '%runid%' AND r.syscreated > DATEADD(HOUR, -2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) -- check for max 2 hours back AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [%abeidb%].dbo._AB_Entity_log r1 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE r1.runid = r.runid AND r1.seqno = -10) -- -10 is 'Finished Running Job'
UPDATE f WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET runid = '%runid%' , rowstatus = 1 , seqno = ISNULL(f.seqno, 100) , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM dbo._AB_tb_Fin_Data f WHERE 1=1 AND f.rowstatus = 0

UPDATE f WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET targetoverride = c.ID , rowstatus = CASE WHEN c.ID IS NULL THEN -1 ELSE f.rowstatus END , seqno = CASE WHEN c.ID IS NULL THEN 101 ELSE 100 END -- Only overwrite when invalid target, back to 100 when valid , sysmessage = CASE WHEN c.ID IS NULL THEN 'Invalid targetDB' END , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM dbo._AB_tb_Fin_Data f LEFT JOIN dbo._AB_sy_ABEI_Entity_connections c WITH (NOLOCK) ON c.db = CONVERT(varchar(50), f.targetDB) WHERE 1=1 AND f.runid = '%runid%'
step.remarks: Set targetoverride option in all Entity steps when you use this. Also, check step 121

step.datasource:
SELECT --TOP (1000) f.HeaderID , f.referencekey , f.dagbknr , f.bkstnr , f.docnumber , f.faktuurnr -- our ref , f.datum , f.docdate , f.debnr , f.crdnr , f.oms25 -- description
, f.reknr , f.bedrag -- amount , f.vatamount , f.btw_code , f.kstplcode , f.kstdrcode , f.artcode , f.facode , f.aantal , f.warehouse , f.warehouse_location , f.unitcode , f.project , f.transsubtype
, f.freefield1 , f.freefield2 , f.freefield3 , f.numberfield1 , f.numberfield2
, f.targetDB FROM dbo._AB_tb_Fin_Data f WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND f.runid = '%runid%' AND f.rowstatus = 1 AND f.seqno = 100
--ORDER BY f.referencekey, reknr DESC

SELECT DISTINCT f.HeaderID , f.HeaderID as referencekey , f.dagbknr , f.datum , f.datum as docdate , 'Memoriaalboeking inleners' as oms25 , f.targetDB FROM dbo._AB_tb_Fin_Data f WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND f.runid = '%runid%' AND f.rowstatus = 1 AND f.seqno = 100

UPDATE f WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET rowstatus = ISNULL(r.rowstatus, -1) , seqno = 120 , sysmessage = REPLACE(REPLACE(ISNULL(r.errormessage, 'No result found') , 'Entiteit: ', '') , ' Property:,Message: ', '') , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM dbo._AB_tb_Fin_Data f LEFT JOIN [%abeidb%].dbo._AB_Entity_results r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.runid = f.runid AND r.Entity = 'FinancialHeader' AND r.ReferenceValue = f.HeaderID AND r.jobid = %jobid% WHERE 1=1 AND f.runid = '%runid%' AND f.rowstatus = 1 AND f.seqno = 100
step.stepname: Update status based on ABEI results

step.datasource: UPDATE f WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET rowstatus = 2 -- Found in Exact, so did not fail , sysmessage = 'Found in Exact' , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM [%abeisourcedb%].dbo._AB_tb_Fin_Data f WHERE 1=1 AND f.runid = '%runid%' AND f.rowstatus = -1 AND f.seqno = 120 -- Exists in.. AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 --ts.dagbknr, ts.faktuurnr, ts.freefield1, ts.freefield2 FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.amutas ts WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND CAST(ts.syscreated as date) = CAST(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as date) -- Only check results for today AND ts.dagbknr = f.dagbknr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT AND ts.freefield1 = f.freefield1 COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT --AND ts.freefield2 = f.freefield2 COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT )
step.remarks: tas: financial lines, you can use tak (header) as well if it contains the data you need to join Please note that using synonymns with dynamic target override in ABEI doesn't guarantee you join the correct DB. When using multiple targets, create one of this step for every DB you have
step.stepname: Cust - Update status based on data in Exact (read note)

step.datasource: SELECT DISTINCT 'Van de volgende regels kon geen inleenuren registratie aangemaakt worden.' as mailTxt_ln1 , 'Controleer de foutmelding en corrigeer waar nodig.' as mailTxt_ln2 , f.oms25 as Omschrijving , f.bedrag as Bedrag , f.reknr as Rekening , f.kstplcode as Kostenplaats , f.mailto FROM dbo._AB_tb_Fin_Data f WHERE 1=1 AND f.runid = '%runid%' AND f.rowstatus <> 2 --AND f.retryCounter = CASE WHEN %mail_at_retrynr% = 0 THEN f.retryCounter ELSE %mail_at_retrynr% END
step.contentbody:
Hallo,

%mailTxt_ln1%

%mailTxt_ln2%






OmschrijvingBedragRekeningKostenplaats
%Omschrijving%%Bedrag%%Rekening%%Kostenplaats%
 


Deze mail is automatisch gegenereerd door ABEI om %abeinow%

run: %runid%

step.datasource: UPDATE f WITH (ROWLOCK, NOWAIT) SET rowstatus = 0 , retryCounter += 1 , sysmodified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP FROM dbo._AB_tb_Fin_Data f WHERE 1=1 AND f.runid = '%runid%' AND f.rowstatus <> 2 AND f.retryCounter < %max_retry%
